FuncDef: The display card-fault process-mode command checks whether the port isolation function of a specified subcard has taken effect.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID of a board.
-

Specifies the ID of the subcard supporting the port isolation function.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The effectiveness state of the port isolation function of a subcard varies with the current configuration. The function can be in either the reset or the isolate state. To check whether the function has taken effect, run the display card-fault process-mode command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
